name: Santa's Night Out
description:
This is a simple game written for the C64 written in BASIC.

 Help Santa deliver the presents paying attention to the witch who hinders you in your task. Deliver as many as possible within 999 seconds when time runs out. 

Studying the code of the  game is useful for learning to program in basic. It makes use of multicolor sprites and sounds. Also use the joystick in port 2.
